attributes.action: Declare a state of national emergency to deal with immigration to the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Taxpayers money being squandered whilst British families struggle with inflation, the cost of living, unnecessary rises in energy prices.Make this committee cross party, involve clever people from the private sector, military, legal advisors. Ensure any actions agreed are continued by the subsequent governments to give a decade plus of focused action during a period of declared national emergency. A focus on Britain and a real investment into our country.
attributes.background: Form a cross party, fast acting, emergency committee to come up with measures to halt illegal immigration. Stop the small boats, end free hotels and housing. Stop free access to all NHS services. Stop all taxpayer funded benefits. Make the actions agreed, enforceable by law and ready in 3 months.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions which call for similar actions, such as: 

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406

Do not house illegal migrants in private rentals, deport them immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726409

Stop publicly funded legal aid to illegal immigrants
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705520

Stop benefits and free healthcare for immigrants who have not worked in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716399

Additionally, the UK does not have a "state of emergency" declaration within the UK legal framework.
